channel.title: Portals
channel.description: i was wondering how do you change the name of a portal like changing the name of a portal to *kbd portal* not ure if its on client or server i would appreciate of you helped me

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @stuckaduck stuckaduck
item.description:
@stuckaduck wrote:

I’m pretty sure to do that you would have to edit the client. One simpler way to do about the same thing would be to put an npc next to it that shouts “KBD Portal” every few seconds.

Read full topic
